Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Drug or Chemical by Structure/Organic Chemical/Alcohol [Chemical Class]/Cetyl Alcohol
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A synthetic, solid, fatty alcohol and nonionic surfactant. Cetyl alcohol is used as an emulsifying agent in pharmaceutical preparations.
